ygData.subject: RE: What you are saying isn't exactly right....
ygData.msgSnippet: Nope. It is not on my Halfling. But at least some one agrees with me that All Races have a base of 50 skill. Thank you so much :) ... From:	Nilen23@aol.com
ygData.messageBody:
Nope. It is not on my Halfling. But at least some one agrees with me that
All Races have a base of 50 skill. Thank you so much :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Nilen23@... [mailto:Nilen23@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 1:56 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] What you are saying isn't exactly right....

From: Nilen23@...

All or atleast some that I now of have a base tinkering of 50. Only gnomes
tinkering can go up. I am currently only levl 15 and i can see my tinkering
skill on the skills section in the persona. I don't now if you can see it on
other races though.
